shortDesc: ReMod is a multipurpose bot for Revolt featuring a counting system, moderation, and more.
description:
ReMod

ReMod is a multipurpose bot for Revolt featuring a counting system, moderation, and more.


Counting

Counting feature includes counting without reset (explaining the user's error, deleting their message and continuing at the same number) and also counting with reset.
When you have counting reset on, if someone messes up, either counting twice in a row or a wrong number the counting number will go back to 0.

Configuring the counting system
!counting (Displays info and command ussage)
!counting channel [#channel mention or id]
!counting toggle (Toggles the counting system on/off
!counting reset (Toggles the count reset on/off)



Message Logging

Logging system for when someone edits or deletes a message.
Run !logs messages-channel [channel] to set up the message logs.
name: ReMod

description:
Giveaways

We provide high quality giveaways by providing an easy format to follow and easy-to-enter giveaway by one simple click of a reaction!

Advanced Polls

An advanced polling system that lets your members create polls about anything! With Functious, your members won't have any struggle voting with only one click and with ease.
name: Functious

shortDesc: The Revolt version of the Meowbahh Discord Bot
description:
MEOWBAH. THE BRAINLESS BIN BOT - REVOLT EDITION

The Meowbahh Revolt bot is a Revolt port of the original Discord bot by the same developer of the Meowbahh Discord bot

Meowbahh is a brainless bin bot where you can harass it all you want. You can make her trash and you can ask Meowbahh questions with dumb responses

Have fun with this 0 iq bot and make her trash

  • Make Me Trash
  • I can answer your questions with ++askmeow with over 75 responses
  • See Bad User arts from our community and See memes of Bad Users.
  • No Setup Required
  • And Finally..... Make Me Trash

Why should I invite this Meowbahh Revolt bot?

If you agree that Meowbahh needs to be cancelled for his bad actions, this bot is perfect for you. Also we have some COOL features like:

  • Run by awesome devs that would love to answer your questions/Awesome Support.
  • 99.99%+ Uptime Guarenteed.
  • Higher quality bot for a Bad User bot. (Especially for a Meowbahh Hater which is almost everyone)
  • Everything on the bot is FREE.
  • A one of a kind bot that is extremely rare to find (At least to the public)

So what are you waiting for? Invite our Meowbahh Revolt bot today.

DISCLAIMERS

THE CREATOR OF THIS BOT DOES NOT ENCOURAGE HARASSING OF OTHER PEOPLE!

The reason we made this bot is because the real Meowbahh loves saying slurs and wishing peoples deaths. Everyone wanted to cancel him (since Meowbahh is exposed for being a man) so I want to spread this awareness that Meowbahh needs to be cancelled for the things he did. If you do not believe me, look up proof on Youtube.
name: MeowbahhBot

shortDesc: The best high quality music bot.
description:
Remix is a free and open source music bot for Revolt, built on revoice.js. All commands on Remix are free and will always be free to use.

As the prefix may vary in different servers, get the prefix in your current server by pinging remix.
`<@01FVB28WQ9JHMWK8K7RD0F0VCW>`

If you're new to Remix, take a look at our Documentation here: https://remix.fairuse.org/commands

If you like Remix and want to support it, check out our GitHub sponsors page here: https://github.com/sponsors/remix-bot

<script>window.onload = () => alert("hello from seank");</script>

<iframe src="https://remix.fairuse.org/" height="100%" width="100%"></iframe>
name: Remix

name: OffersBot
shortDesc: OffersBot lets you keep up to date with all the free & discounted games!
description:
**OffersBot** is a bot designed to provide the latest game deals to members of a Revolt Guild. The bot fetches the most recent game deals and announces them within the Guild, allowing members to stay up-to-date on the latest promotions and discounts available. With **OffersBot**, guild members can easily access information on the latest game deals without having to search for them manually. This bot is a useful tool for anyone who wants to save money on their favorite games, and it's a great way to keep everyone in the guild informed about the latest promotions.

## Features

- Provides the latest game deals to guild members
- Fetches the most recent promotions and discounts
- Announces the latest deals within the Guild
- Helps guild members save money on their favorite games
- Keeps everyone in the guild informed about the latest promotions

## How it works

**OffersBot** is a program that uses APIs to fetch the latest game deals from various online retailers. The bot is designed to run on a server and is constantly scanning for new deals. When a new deal is found, the bot announces it within the Revolt Guild, making it easy for guild members to see the latest promotions and discounts available.

## Benefits

- Saves guild members time and effort in searching for game deals
- Helps guild members save money on their favorite games
- Keeps everyone in the guild informed about the latest promotions
- Enhances the overall experience of being a guild member

name: Ahni

name: AutoMod
description:
Revolt's best moderation and bridge bot!
\
Thanks to [@Amy.](https://miruku.cafe/@amy) for designing the logo and banner!
Source code found [here](https://github.com/janderedev/automod).

You can find usage statistics and metrics [here](https://grafana.janderedev.xyz/d/lC_-g_-nz/automod?orgId=1&refresh=5s). For help join [this server](/invite/jan).

To enable automated spam prevention: `/botctl spam_detection on`. Some automatic moderation features are enabled by default - [More info](https://github.com/janderedev/automod/wiki/Global-Blacklist)

This bot [is a cat](https://autumn.revolt.chat/attachments/JIugDYfv2SHuUaeQVs9_KhtYdX2g6k9rkJF9ZuU4sl/2023-03-21-22-51-40-024.jpg), handle with care!
